abstract: Authorities in Chechnya's capital Grozny say suicide bomber killed five police officers and wounded 12 others at a security checkpoint near the entrance to where thousands of people were gathering for a holiday concert and fireworks.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber killed five police officers and wounded 12 others on Sunday in Grozny, the capital of Chechnya, at a security checkpoint near the entrance to where thousands of people were gathering for a holiday concert and fireworks, the authorities said.

headline.main: Bomber Kills 5 in Chechnya on a Day of Celebrations
headline.print_headline: Bomber Kills 5 in Chechnya on a Day of Celebrations
